name: WORDDING
description:
WHAT __ WORDDING?

WORDDING is a fast paced typing trivia game. Fill in quotes from movies, common phrases and song lyrics.

HOW TO ____

Playing WORDDING is simple. Fill in the blanks. If you get it right, you get 2 more seconds to keep playing. Get it wrong and you lose two seconds. Being a second away from defeat is common place in WORDDING.
